1508050.name: Not Another Princess Game
1508050.description:
A princess locked in a tower.
Some heroes who come to rescue her. Will they succeed?

You've seen this approach hundreds of times, but remember, this is Not Another Princess Game.




Go through the different floors of the tower, from the dungeons to the exit, passing through the rooms of the guards and the chambers of the nobles who inhabit it. Escape from the prison without being discovered on the way, activating mechanisms and using different objects.

Features
  • Stealth game, avoid being discovered!
  • Beautiful pixel art graphics.
  • Different items to use.
1508050.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
